name: Negative Space (itch) (PogoStickGuy)
description:
Negative Space is a top down shooter for two players.

Both players will need a wired controller in order to play.

Each player controls a spaceship, one is black and one is white. The ships blend into the background which allows you to hide from the other player. When you shoot, you flash bright colors, which reveals your current position to you and your opponent.

Controls: 

Right Trigger: press to shoot, hold to flash colors.

Left Trigger: move forward.

Left Stick: change direction.
